summary: The module supplies utilities and pytest integration tests that orchestrate a temporary Nginx server, generate its configuration, and execute Certbot commands to obtain and deploy TLS certificates, validating the behavior of the Certbot Nginx plugin.
business_intent: Automate end‑to‑end verification of the Certbot Nginx plugin within continuous integration pipelines, ensuring that certificate acquisition and deployment work correctly against a real Nginx instance and preventing regressions before release.
